Articles.Content:
So if they were to make a trailer for 1.0 and you had to choose the perfect song for it what would it be?

My vote is "Faith of the Heart" by Russel Watson

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TLs4MGTTXRU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
I can find several royal free songs by that mc what's his name.

Well, I was perusing the nets today searching for Old KSP videos and found this, by a certain [Filipe Falanghe](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/4-HarvesteR) ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) :

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/C1xvfTFOYNg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

For some reason, I find it fitting to the game ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

This link:

[https://soundcloud.com/alvaroalorite/kerbal-space-program-theme](https://soundcloud.com/alvaroalorite/kerbal-space-program-theme)

It's the best remastered KSP theme I've ever heard.

Seriously, listen at least a little bit.

Sorry for this... Really... There are no other words or music to compare...

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9jK-NcRmVcw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> I can find several royal free songs by that mc what's his name.

Kevin Mcleod.
Fireflies by Owl City.

> 
> Kevin Mcleod.

Thanks Spartwo- incomputech.net is it?
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Mu0cE9RgK5M?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

My music tastes aren't suited to everyone's, but I am DEFINITELY playing Metallica's Fuel when I mine for resources (fuel) for the first time!

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/G1cjHbXdU0s?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

*So gimme fuel*

*Gimme fire*

*Gimme that which I desire!*

Stay metal! \m/

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-22T23:38:36Z" title="04/22/2015 11:38  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 22, 2015</time> by SpenSpaceCorp**
80's montage music comes to mind, as does the into to 2001

> 
> This link:
> [https://soundcloud.com/alvaroalorite/kerbal-space-program-theme](https://soundcloud.com/alvaroalorite/kerbal-space-program-theme)
> 
> It's the best remastered KSP theme I've ever heard.
> 
> Seriously, listen at least a little bit.

This is amazing. I definitely support this one, it takes the classic KSP theme (which is already amazing) and gives it an "epic" feeling. Perfect for a trailer!

M83- outro 

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pkOHtAnOviU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pkOHtAnOviU)

it always gets me inspired:)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AMLZ8wTVPFI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I don't know about official music, but I'll be blasting this.

I've been wanting to Kerbalize the video for "Countdown" by Rush, but it's way beyond my vid-fu skillz. It would have made an excellent lead-up to release.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XW-8yCKwhBE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Edit: 

> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AMLZ8wTVPFI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
> 
> I don't know about official music, but I'll be blasting this.

That's always been one of my favorite KSP vids. Now it needs updating for the new 'splodeyness

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-23T07:42:56Z" title="04/23/2015 07:42  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 23, 2015</time> by KotDemopan**

"Rocket" by Smashing Pumpkins is my KSP zen conduit.

I will be brave...

> 
> "Rocket" by Smashing Pumpkins is my KSP zen conduit.
> I will be brave...

Nice. And here I thought nobody remembered Smashing Pumpkins any longer.

Another song comes to mind: I Believe I Can Fly. Why not?
KSP theme. It almost makes me want to salute.

> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AMLZ8wTVPFI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
> 
> I don't know about official music, but I'll be blasting this.

Awwww yisssss! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
